title: Module Federation SSR Dev Server
description: Serve a SSR Consumer (host) application along with its known Producers (remotes).

browserTarget.description: Target which builds the browser application.

serverTarget.description: Target which builds the server application.

port.description: The port to be set on `process.env.PORT` for use in the server.

devRemotes.description: List of Producer (remote) applications to run in development mode (i.e. using serve target).

skipRemotes.description: List of Producer (remote) applications to not automatically serve, either statically or in development mode.

staticRemotesPort.description: The port at which to serve the file-server for the static Producers (remotes).

pathToManifestFile.description: Path to a Module Federation manifest file (e.g. `my/path/to/module-federation.manifest.json`) containing the dynamic Producer (remote) applications relative to the workspace root.

sslKey.description: SSL key to use for serving HTTPS.

sslCert.description: SSL certificate to use for serving HTTPS.

isInitialHost.description: Whether the Consumer (host) that is running this executor is the first in the project tree to do so.
